Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util

Class TableDescriptorChecker

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.TableDescriptorChecker
@Private public final class TableDescriptorChecker extends Object
Only used for master to sanity check TableDescriptor.

      public static void sanityCheck(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration c, TableDescriptor td) throws IOException
      Checks whether the table conforms to some sane limits, and configured values (compression, etc) work. Throws an exception if something is wrong.
